solution_line_template: In three years, Michael will have {michael_now}+{michael_increase} = <<{michael_now}+{michael_increase}={michael_future}>>{michael_future} trophies.
If Michael has {michael_now} trophies now, Jack will have {jack_multiplier}*{michael_now} = <<{michael_now}*{jack_multiplier}={jack_future}>>{jack_future} in three years.
Altogether, Jack and Michael will have {jack_future}+{michael_future} = <<{jack_future}+{michael_future}={total_trophies}>>{total_trophies} handball trophies in three years.
